content.description: The following question is based on a recording of a march. The excerpt includes the introduction, the first phrase and its repetition, and the first few measures of the second phrase.
content.question: After the short introduction, in which of the following voices are trills heard?

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply harmonic, melodic, and rhythmic procedures of 18th-century voice leading (up to 4 voices) in performed music.
